title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for identifying x= 0,2,3

1 point is earned for explanation

The graph of y = g(x) has points of inflection at x=0, x=2, and x=3 because g' changes from increasing to decreasing at x=0 and x=3, and g' changes from decreasing to increasing at x=2.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for identifying x= 0,2,3

1 point is earned for explanation

The graph of y = g(x) has points of inflection at x=0, x=2, and x=3 because g' changes from increasing to decreasing at x=0 and x=3, and g' changes from decreasing to increasing at x=2.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for identifying x= 0,2,3

1 point is earned for explanation

The graph of y = g(x) has points of inflection at x=0, x=2, and x=3 because g' changes from increasing to decreasing at x=0 and x=3, and g' changes from decreasing to increasing at x=2.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for identifying x= 0,2,3

1 point is earned for explanation

The graph of y = g(x) has points of inflection at x=0, x=2, and x=3 because g' changes from increasing to decreasing at x=0 and x=3, and g' changes from decreasing to increasing at x=2.
